review: Truely a Gem! Great acting and superb storytelling. Reality and struggles of Indian common man, shown in an entertaining manner. Must watch.

A very subtle, nice interesting and catchy movie. Climax was a bit disappointing.

All star cast have acted perfectly
Such a great movie. Really underappreciated. Storyline and flow is really great and subtle.
Awesome story, Acting of all, a masterclass!
